title: Tuesday Things.

Don’t even want to say it but I might be a tea person this season. The david’s tea holiday flavors are so good. […] The post Tuesday Things. appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. This time of year just makes me wonder why we don’t have twinkly lights up 24/7. 2. These garlic butter rolls may need to end up on my Thanksgiving menu. 3. Don’t even want to say it but I might be a tea person this season. The david’s tea holiday flavors are so good. […]
text: 1. This time of year just makes me wonder why we don’t have twinkly lights up 24/7. 2. These garlic butter rolls may need to end up on my Thanksgiving menu. 3. Don’t even want to say it but I might be a tea person this season. The david’s tea holiday flavors are so good. 4, How to be more grateful. This is so good. 5. TV things!! Ugh, I am just not loving Yellowstone. Anyone else?! It was my favorite show (possibly of all time!) for so many years. Now this. 6. Max has been begging me to make pizza fries?! Anyone try these? 7. I love this yellow legal pad method for cooking a big meal. 8. Crushed potato chips on boxed mac and cheese. Try it!!!
html:
1. This time of year just makes me wonder why we don’t have twinkly lights up 24/7.

2. These garlic butter rolls may need to end up on my Thanksgiving menu.

3. Don’t even want to say it but I might be a tea person this season. The david’s tea holiday flavors are so good.

4, How to be more grateful. This is so good.

5. TV things!! Ugh, I am just not loving Yellowstone. Anyone else?! It was my favorite show (possibly of all time!) for so many years. Now this.

6. Max has been begging me to make pizza fries?! Anyone try these?

7. I love this yellow legal pad method for cooking a big meal.

8. Crushed potato chips on boxed mac and cheese. Try it!!!
